PLEX_HOST_DOC: Hostname or IP address of your Plex Media Server (e.g. 192.168.1.100)
PLEX_PORT_DOC: Port number for your Plex Media Server (default: 32400)
PLEX_TOKEN_DOC: Your Plex authentication token. See https://support.plex.tv/articles/204059436/ for instructions.
PLEX_HTTPS_DOC: Enable HTTPS for connecting to your Plex server. Connection fails if your server does not support HTTPS.
PLEX_SHUFFLE_DOC: Show a Shuffle item at the top of every album and playlist. Clicking it displays the tracks in a randomized order.
PLEX_PAGE_SIZE_DOC: Number of items to load per page when browsing artists, albums, and playlists. Lower values load faster, higher values show more items at once.
